tosdr.tldr: Once an eSix account has been made, it cannot be deleted. Both regular users and the administration recommends that users change their account's usernames, passwords, and email address to completely random ones to make it harder for their account to be accessed again. However, accounts maintain their ID numbers (shown in the URL) and all of the account's undeleted posts, deleted post history, tag edits, wiki edits, unhidden comments, et cetera will remain visible to all users.
tosdr.case: You cannot delete your account of this service

title: You cannot delete your account of this service
